full_summary:
================

### Upgrade of the Data Acquisition System in the Structure Lab

**Contract Reference:** # cb-484-64748846
**Amendment:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58190
**Publication Date:** January 9, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 24, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

**Notice of Proposed Procurement:**
=================================
The National Research Council Canada is seeking to upgrade the data acquisition system in the Structure Lab. The Construction Research Centre (CRC) of the NRC requires additional data acquisition (DAQ) equipment to supplement existing or aging HBM equipment in the CRC's structural laboratory.

**Scope:**
The proposed procurement is for the supply and installation of data acquisition equipment compatible with the existing HBM equipment. The tender includes documentation, training, and testing of the new equipment.

**Bid Opportunities:**
The procurement is open to all qualified bidders.

**Regional Information:**
------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   1200 Montreal Road, Bldg M24
    *   Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6 Canada
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Additional Resources:**
-------------------------

*   A notice package containing detailed specifications and instructions is available on the Canada Buys portal at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
*   Contact information for the contracting officer:
    *   Name: Stéphane Lajoie
    *   Email: stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (514) 210-7395
*   Attachment links:
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/28961/23-58190\_npp\_notice-of-proposed-procurement-avis-de-projet-de-marche.apm__1.pdf

**Payment:**
All bids must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys portal. Payment is subject to standard payment terms outlined in the tender document. All questions and clarifications should be submitted in writing to the contracting officer via email or mail.
